'''Mt. Mushroom (For One)''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Cheesy Mushroom Skewer]] with [[Varesa]]. The [[recipe]] for Cheesy Mushroom Skewer is obtained from the {{Quest|Orchard Repose}}.

Mt. Mushroom (For One) increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''16'''% for 300 seconds. In [[Co-Op Mode]], this effect only applies to your own character(s).
